p: Aerial parts of Hibiscus noldeae were collected from the arboretum of Ruhande, in Huye district, Southern province in Rwanda. The plant species was identified with reference to herbarium specimens and various literature resources by Nshutiyayesu Samuel (from the University of Rwanda, Huye, Rwanda) and the authentication and ID verification by Dr. Olivier Lachenaud (from the Botanic Garden Meise/Meise, Belgium) as previously reported [ 21].
